column1: Sari Naurang is a tehsil located in Lakki Marwat District
column4: 908 according to the 2017 census. It is a mostly rural area
column5: but it does contain one urban area
column8: 955.  Naurang is the second-largest city in Lakki Marwat District and the third-largest in Bannu Division.
